title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 195.5 - Illumination of authorized signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 195.5 - Illumination of authorized signs

State Regulations
(a) Only white artificial lighting shall be used to illuminate such sign. (b) No flashing, intermittent or moving light
or lights shall constitute a part of or be used to illuminate such
sign. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
195.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
